lead_paragraph: SQUIRE--Annette C. of Boynton Beach, FL, devoted and beloved wife for almost 60 years of the (late) Albert Squire, daughter of the late Irving and Bella (nee Lehman) Cohen, sister of the late Molly Gershen, mother of Jeffrey and Judi Squire, loving grandmother of Evan and Emma Squire, and aunt to Robert and Joe Gershen, Susan Stoll, Susan Albright and Laura Stamm, passed away peacefully surrounded by family on December 8, 2015 at Delray Medical Center following a stroke on December 7. Annette, who turned 90 December 2, graduated with a B.S. from Columbia University School of Nursing and an M.S. from the University of Pennsylvania School of Nursing. Starting her career in New York City for the Visiting Nurse Service, Annette then spent many years in Pennsylvania as a school nurse for the Pennsbury School System. All who knew Annette recognized that she was a caring and skillful nurse and loving mother, aunt, grandmother, sister, daughter, niece, cousin and friend. Annette cared deeply for the people in her life and we all will miss her warm smile, concern, and love. Her family expresses their heartfelt appreciation to her skillful, kind, loving and warm caregivers, Kimberly Barrett and Jacques Clervil. A memorial service is being planned for early 2016. The family knows that Annette would appreciate contributions in her memory to the University of Pennsylvania School of Nursing 215-898-484 nursing.upenn.edu/friends giving, Columbia University School of Nursing, 866-GIFTSYS, or nursing.columbia.edu/giving, a charity benefiting Israel or any charity of your choice. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SQUIRE, ANNETTE C
